title: Ask a Scientist-- AMA about anything-- AMAAA
body:
Ever been curious about GMOs? Evolution? The STEM fields? The future of the human race? Ask a scientist. Anything is fair game though. 

My specialty is genetics, specifically genes involved with xenobiotic detoxification and applications of those genes, such as bioremediation. I'm studying to be an astrobiologist though, so questions about space, geology, chemistry, etc. are all within my realm due to the interdisciplinary nature of the field. Because I'm not a scum-sucking statist, I also have a budding education in business and will be applying for my MBA once I finish my MS. So, this is also a businessman AMA.
